criteria.name: Participation in a criminal organisation
criteria.description: Has the economic operator itself or any person who is a member of its administrative, management or supervisory body or has powers of representation, decision or control therein been the subject of a conviction by final judgment for participation in a criminal organisation, by a conviction rendered at the most five years ago or in which an exclusion period set out directly in the conviction continues to be applicable? As defined in Article 2 of Council Framework Decision 2008/841/JHA of 24 October 2008 on the fight against organised crime (OJ L 300, 11.11.2008, p. 42).

criterionType.description: Grounds for exclusion relating to criminal convictions

legislationReference.title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

requirements.description: Length of the period of exclusion
Have you taken measures to demonstrate your reliability ("Self-Cleaning")?

criteria.name: Corruption
criteria.description: Has the economic operator itself or any person who is a member of its administrative, management or supervisory body or has powers of representation, decision or control therein been the subject of a conviction by final judgment for corruption, by a conviction rendered at the most five years ago or in which an exclusion period set out directly in the conviction continues to be applicable? As defined in Article 3 of the Convention on the fight against corruption involving officials of the European Communities or officials of Member States of the European Union, OJ C 195, 25.6.1997, p. 1, and in Article 2(1) of Council Framework Decision 2003/568/JHA of 22 July 2003 on combating corruption in the private sector (OJ L 192, 31.7.2003, p. 54). This exclusion ground also includes corruption as defined in the national law of the contracting authority (contracting entity) or the economic operator.

criterionType.description: Grounds for exclusion relating to criminal convictions

legislationReference.title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

requirements.description: Length of the period of exclusion
Have you taken measures to demonstrate your reliability ("Self-Cleaning")?

criteria.name: Fraud
criteria.description: Has the economic operator itself or any person who is a member of its administrative, management or supervisory body or has powers of representation, decision or control therein been the subject of a conviction by final judgment for fraud, by a conviction rendered at the most five years ago or in which an exclusion period set out directly in the conviction continues to be applicable? Within the meaning of Article 1 of the Convention on the protection of the European Communities' financial interests (OJ C 316, 27.11.1995, p. 48).

criterionType.description: Grounds for exclusion relating to criminal convictions

legislationReference.title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

requirements.description: Length of the period of exclusion
Have you taken measures to demonstrate your reliability ("Self-Cleaning")?

criteria.name: Terrorist offences or offences linked to terrorist activities
criteria.shortName: Terrorist offences or offences linked to terrorist activities
criteria.description: Has the economic operator itself or any person who is a member of its administrative, management or supervisory body or has powers of representation, decision or control therein been the subject of a conviction by final judgment for terrorist offences or offences linked to terrorist activities, by a conviction rendered at the most five years ago or in which an exclusion period set out directly in the conviction continues to be applicable? As defined in Articles 1 and 3 of Council Framework Decision of 13 June 2002 on combating terrorism (OJ L 164, 22.6.2002, p. 3). This exclusion ground also includes inciting or aiding or abetting or attempting to commit an offence, as referred to in Article 4 of that Framework Decision.

criterionType.description: Grounds for exclusion relating to criminal convictions

legislationReference.title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

requirements.description: Length of the period of exclusion
Have you taken measures to demonstrate your reliability ("Self-Cleaning")?

criteria.name: Money laundering or terrorist financing
criteria.description: Has the economic operator itself or any person who is a member of its administrative, management or supervisory body or has powers of representation, decision or control therein been the subject of a conviction by final judgment for money laundering or terrorist financing, by a conviction rendered at the most five years ago or in which an exclusion period set out directly in the conviction continues to be applicable? As defined in Article 1 of Directive 2005/60/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 26 October 2005 on the prevention of the use of the financial system for the purpose of money laundering and terrorist financing (OJ L 309, 25.11.2005, p. 15).

criterionType.description: Grounds for exclusion relating to criminal convictions

legislationReference.title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

requirements.description: Length of the period of exclusion
Have you taken measures to demonstrate your reliability ("Self-Cleaning")?

criteria.name: Child labour and other forms of trafficking in human beings
criteria.shortName: Child labour and other forms of trafficking in human beings
criteria.description: Has the economic operator itself or any person who is a member of its administrative, management or supervisory body or has powers of representation, decision or control therein been the subject of a conviction by final judgment for child labour and other forms of trafficking in human beings, by a conviction rendered at the most five years ago or in which an exclusion period set out directly in the conviction continues to be applicable? As defined in Article 2 of Directive 2011/36/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council of 5 April 2011 on preventing and combating trafficking in human beings and protecting its victims, and replacing Council Framework Decision 2002/629/JHA (OJ L 101, 15.4.2011, p. 1).

criterionType.description: Grounds for exclusion relating to criminal convictions

criteria.name: Payment of taxes
criteria.description: Has the economic operator breached its obligations relating to the payment of taxes, both in the country in which it is established and in Member State of the contracting authority or contracting entity if other than the country of establishment?

criterionType.description: Grounds for exclusion relating to the payment of taxes contributions

legislationReference.title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

requirements.description: Has this breach of obligations been established by means other than a judicial or administrative decision?
Please describe which means were used
If this breach of obligations was established through a judicial or administrative decision, was this decision final and binding?
Length of the period of exclusion

Has the economic operator fulfilled its obligations by paying or entering into a binding arrangement with a view to paying the taxes or social security contributions due, including, where applicable, any interest accrued or fines?

criteria.name: Payment of social security contributions
criteria.description: Has the economic operator breached its obligations relating to the payment social security contributions, both in the country in which it is established and in Member State of the contracting authority or contracting entity if other than the country of establishment?

criterionType.description: Grounds for exclusion relating to the payment of social security contributions

Has the economic operator fulfilled its obligations by paying or entering into a binding arrangement with a view to paying the taxes or social security contributions due, including, where applicable, any interest accrued or fines?

criteria.shortName: Breaching of obligations in the fields of environmental law

criteria.name: Bankruptcy
criteria.description: Is the economic operator bankrupt? This information needs not be given if exclusion of economic operators in this case has been made mandatory under the applicable national law without any possibility of derogation where the economic operator is nevertheless able to perform the contract.

criterionType.description: Grounds for exclusion for bankruptcy or insolvency

requirements.description: Indicate reasons for being nevertheless to perform the contract

criteria.name: Insolvency
criteria.description: Is the economic operator the subject of insolvency or winding-up? This information needs not be given if exclusion of economic operators in this case has been made mandatory under the applicable national law without any possibility of derogation where the economic operator is nevertheless able to perform the contract.

criterionType.description: Grounds for exclusion for bankruptcy or insolvency

criteria.description: Is the economic operator in arrangement with creditors? This information needs not be given if exclusion of economic operators in this case has been made mandatory under the applicable national law without any possibility of derogation where the economic operator is nevertheless able to perform the contract.

criterionType.description: Grounds for exclusion for bankruptcy or insolvency

requirements.description: Indicate reasons for being nevertheless to perform the contract

criteria.name: Analogous situation like bankruptcy under national law
criteria.shortName: Analogous situation like bankruptcy under national law
criteria.description: Is the economic operator in any analogous situation like bankruptcy arising from a similar procedure under national laws and regulations? This information needs not be given if exclusion of economic operators in this case has been made mandatory under the applicable national law without any possibility of derogation where the economic operator is nevertheless able to perform the contract.

criteria.description: Are the business activities of the economic operator suspended?  This information needs not be given if exclusion of economic operators in this case has been made mandatory under the applicable national law without any possibility of derogation where the economic operator is nevertheless able to perform the contract.

criteria.shortName: Conflict of interest due to its participation in the procurement procedure
criteria.description: Is the economic operator aware of any conflict of interest, as indicated in national law, the relevant notice or the procurement documents due to its participation in the procurement procedure?

criterionType.description: Grounds for exclusion relating to possible conflicts of interests

legislationReference.title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

criteria.name: Direct or indirect involvement in the preparation of this procurement procedure
criteria.shortName: Direct or indirect involvement in the preparation of this procurement procedure
criteria.description: Has the economic operator or an undertaking related to it advised the contracting authority or contracting entity or otherwise been involved in the preparation of the procurement procedure?

criterionType.description: Grounds for exclusion relating to possible conflicts of interests

legislationReference.title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

criteria.name: Early termination, damages or other comparable sanctions
criteria.shortName: Early termination, damages or other comparable sanctions
criteria.description: Has the economic operator experienced that a prior public contract, a prior contract with a contracting entity or a prior concession contract was terminated early, or that damages or other comparable sanctions were imposed in connection with that prior contract?

criterionType.description: Grounds for exclusion relating to possible conflicts of interests

legislationReference.title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

requirements.description: Have you taken measures to demonstrate your reliability ("Self-Cleaning")?

criteria.name: Guilty of misinterpretation, withheld information, unable to provide required documents and obtained confidential information of this procedure
criteria.shortName: Guilty of misinterpretation, withheld information, unable to provide required documents and obtained confidential information of this procedure
criteria.description: Can the economic operator confirm the four exclusion grounds, that it has not been guilty of serious misrepresentation in supplying the information required for the verification of the absence of grounds for exclusion or the fulfilment of the selection criteria, that it has not withheld such information, it has been able, without delay, to submit the supporting documents required by a contracting authority or contracting entity, and it has not undertaken to unduly influence the decision making process of the contracting authority or contracting entity, to obtain confidential information that may confer upon it undue advantages in the procurement procedure or to negligently provide misleading information that may have a material influence on decisions concerning exclusion, selection or award?

criterionType.description: Grounds for exclusion relating to possible conflicts of interests

legislationReference.title: DIRECTIVE 2014/24/EU OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 26 February 2014 on public procurement and repealing Directive 2004/18/EC

criteria.name: Purely national exclusion grounds
criteria.description: Other exclusion grounds that may be foreseen in the national legislation of the contracting authoritys or contracting entitys Member State. Do the purely national grounds of exclusion, which are specified in the relevant notice or in the procurement documents, apply?

criterionType.description: Other exclusion grounds that may be foreseen in the national legislation of the contracting authority's or contracting entity's Member State
